ability.Tail Whip: When this Pokemon finishes an attack, it has a 50% chance to gain a random stat boost.
ability.Boulder Shield: This Pokemon takes 1/3 less damage from Physical attacks.

Herbivore Slam.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Rock Crush.effect: Has a 25% chance to flinch the target.

Stone Garden.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP.

Leaf Surge.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
